text: Rahi maut, to jahan bhi tum ho woh bahar haal tumhein aakar rahegi khwa tum kaisi hi mazboot imaraton mein ho, agar unhein koi faiyda pahunchta hai to kehte hain yeh Allah ki taraf se hai, aur agar koi nuksaan pahunchta hai to kehte hain yeh tumhari badaulat hai. Kaho, sabkuch Allah hi ki taraf se hai, aakhir in logon ko kya ho gaya hai ke koi baat inki samajhe mein nahin aati
